titleInfo.title: Gauge-invariant intense-field approximations to all orders

name.namePart: AG Theoretische Atom-, Molekül- und Laserphysik

mods.abstract: We present a gauge-invariant formulation of the so-called strong-field KFR approximations in the 'velocity' and 'length' gauges and demonstrate their equivalence in all orders. The theory thus overcomes a longstanding discrepancy between the strong-field velocity and the length-gauge approximations for non-perturbative processes in intense laser fields.
